analyzed: gsum pa ni snam phran dgu pa ste /

original: de yan chad ji snyed byas kyang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yan chad ji snyed byas kyang mnyam par 'gyur ro //

original: glegs bu'i tshad nges pa ni phyis brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: glegs bu'i tshad nges pa ni phyis brjod par bya'o //

original: ci'i phyir ma dras par grong du kun du spyad pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma dras par grong du kun du spyad pa ma yin zhe na /

translated: The monk is distinguished by two kinds of attributes, those of the ordained and those of the householder.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs kyis so //
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs kyis so //
translated: The former are color and shape.

original: de dag gis gos dkar ba dang / 'jam pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gis gos dkar ba dang / 'jam pa'o //

original: de las bzlog pa ni dge slong rnams gyi chos gos dras pa dang / kha dog ngan pa byas pa dang bcas te /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni dge slong rnams gyi chos gos dras pa dang / kha dog ngan pa byas pa dang bcas te /

original: chos gos ni de skad gsungs so //
analyzed: chos gos ni de skad gsungs so //

original: de zin pa ni bkru ba dang / kha bsgyur ba dang / btsem pas so //
analyzed: de zin pa ni bkru ba dang / kha bsgyur ba dang / btsem pas so //

analyzed: de la bkru pa'i kun du spyad pa ni btso blag mkhan la gos rnams 'khrur gzhug par mi bya'o//
translated: The practice of washing is that you should not have a washerman wash your robes.

analyzed: @139b btso blag mkhan gyi 'chag sar song ste rang gis shing dang rtsig pa la sogs pa la gdab par mi bya ste /

analyzed: gzhong pa'i nang du chu bde bas lag pa rnams kyis dang rkang pa rnams kyis mthar gyis dal bus bkru bar bya'o //

analyzed: gang spos dang phye ma rnams bskus pa de sprugs pa ste spyad par bya'o //

analyzed: gang mchan khung gi snum gyis gos pa de ni sran phye la sogs pas dbyung ngo //
translated: That which is stained with armpit oil should be removed with lentil flour, etc.

original: btso blag bya ba'i kun du spyad pa ni /
analyzed: btso blag bya ba'i kun du spyad pa ni /
translated: The practice of dyeing.

original: gtun la sogs par nam mcho ma du brdungs la bskams te bskol na tshon 'byung gi gsher ba las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtun la sogs par nam mcho ma du brdungs la bskams te bskol na tshon 'byung gi gsher ba las ni ma yin no //
translated: When one has pounded the dye in a mortar, etc., one should dry it and boil it. The color comes from that, not from the liquid.

original: tshon yang bum pa la sogs par dang po dang / 'bring dang tha ma so sor gzhag go //
analyzed: tshon yang bum pa la sogs par dang po dang / 'bring dang tha ma so sor gzhag go //
translated: The dye should be placed in a pot, etc., in three parts: first, middle, and last.

original: thog mar ni dang po'i nang du gzhug go //
analyzed: thog mar ni dang po'i nang du gzhug go //
translated: First, one should put it in the first part.

original: bar du ni 'bring po'o //
analyzed: bar du ni 'bring po'o //
translated: In the middle, in the middle part.

original: tha ma ni tha ma'i nang du'o //
analyzed: tha ma ni tha ma'i nang du'o //
translated: In the end, in the last part.

original: gzhong par byas pa'i nang du tshon mi mang par ran tsam gyi nang du gzhug par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhong par byas pa'i nang du tshon mi mang par ran tsam gyi nang du gzhug par bya ste /
translated: One should put the dye in a basin, not too much, just enough.

original: tshon thams cad kyi nang du ni gzhug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: tshon thams cad kyi nang du ni gzhug par mi bya'o //

original: srad bu bres pa la dbang du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: srad bu bres pa la dbang du gzhug par bya'o //

original: yang dang yang du bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang du bzlog par bya'o //

original: snam sbyar chen po ni shing bkram pa'i steng du bzlog cing bskam par bya'o //
analyzed: snam sbyar chen po ni shing bkram pa'i steng du bzlog cing bskam par bya'o //

original: gos sar pa ni tshon sar pa'i nang du btso bar bya ste /
analyzed: gos sar pa ni tshon sar pa'i nang du btso bar bya ste /
translated: New robes should be boiled in a dye bath.

original: nyi ma la bskam par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma la bskam par bya'o //
translated: They should be dried in the sun.

original: rnying pa ni rnying pa'i nang du ste /
analyzed: rnying pa ni rnying pa'i nang du ste /
translated: Old robes should be boiled in old dye.

original: grib ma la bskam mo //
analyzed: grib ma la bskam mo //
translated: They should be dried in the shade.

original: tha mang chu'i nad du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: tha mang chu'i nad du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: The smallest should be put in water.

original: gtsug lag khang du btso blag bya ste /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du btso blag bya ste /

original: sa tshon gyis ma rung bar 'gyur ba ni skyang nul bya'o //
analyzed: sa tshon gyis ma rung bar 'gyur ba ni skyang nul bya'o //
translated: If the ground is damaged by dye, it should be plastered.

original: rngo thal can gyi phyogs ni bkru bar bya'o //
analyzed: rngo thal can gyi phyogs ni bkru bar bya'o //
translated: The damaged part should be washed.

original: btsem pa'i kun du spyad pa ni zhing gi snang bzhin du dra bar bya'o //
analyzed: btsem pa'i kun du spyad pa ni zhing gi snang bzhin du dra bar bya'o //
translated: The practice of sewing should be done like the practice of farming.

original: snol ma'i thog ma ni ngos gnyis kyi mtha' skor gyi 'og tu gzhug go //
analyzed: snol ma'i thog ma ni ngos gnyis kyi mtha' skor gyi 'og tu gzhug go //

original: mtha' skor ni gsum ste ;
analyzed: mtha' skor ni gsum ste ;
translated: There are three kinds of seams:

original: chen po dang / 'bring dang / chung du'o //üîΩchen po ni sor bzhi 'am /
analyzed: chen po dang / 'bring dang / chung du'o // chen po ni sor bzhi 'am /

analyzed: bya rog gi mtho gang ngo //

original: chung du ni sor gnyis so //
analyzed: chung du ni sor gnyis so //

original: 'bring ni de'i bar ma'o //
analyzed: 'bring ni de'i bar ma'o //

original: gang gi mchog pa nges tshal bus glan par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi mchog pa nges tshal bus glan par bya'o //

original: glegs bu phyed pa dang / glegs bu chen po rnams mnyam par gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: glegs bu phyed pa dang / glegs bu chen po rnams mnyam par gcad par bya'o //

original: mi mnyam par ma yin no //
analyzed: mi mnyam par ma yin no //

original: de'i tshad ni shing bus gzhal lo //
analyzed: de'i tshad ni shing bus gzhal lo //
translated: Their size is measured by the stick.

original: mtha' rnams kyang bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: mtha' rnams kyang bskor bar bya ste /

original: rlung dang rjes su mthun pa'i rnam grangs su gtogs so //
analyzed: rlung dang rjes su mthun pa'i rnam grangs su gtogs so //
translated: This is included in the category of following the wind.

original: mtha' skor sor bzhi'i 'og tu sgrog rten glan te ngos gnyis kar sgrog gzungs gdags par bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' skor sor bzhi'i 'og tu sgrog rten glan te ngos gnyis kar sgrog gzungs gdags par bya'o //

analyzed: mtha' sgong gyi drung du sgrog @140a * //

original: rten glan te ngos gnyi gar sgro gu gdags so //
analyzed: rten glan te ngos gnyi gar sgro gu gdags so //

original: sgro gu'i mdud pa gsum ste /
analyzed: sgro gu'i mdud pa gsum ste /

analyzed: shing tog ka ta ga'i 'bras bu lta bu dang / lcam pa'i 'bras bu lta bu dang / ka tam pa'i me tog lta bu'o //

original: mi dra ba lnga ste /
analyzed: mi dra ba lnga ste /

analyzed: be'u ras thams cad dang / la ba thams cad dang / phying pa thams cad dang / lham thams cad dang / seng ba thams cad do //

original: tshal bus glan te bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshal bus glan te bcang bar bya'o //

analyzed: shing leb med pa'i sar ni ba lang gi lci bas byug gam lo mas bsku'o //

original: de med na chag chag btab ste /
analyzed: de med na chag chag btab ste /

analyzed: phyag dar byas la dra ba dang drub par bya'o //

analyzed: ji skad bstan pa rnams ma byas na thams cad du nyes byas so //

original: de la ci ltar gding zhe na /
analyzed: de la ci ltar gding zhe na /

analyzed: thog mar 'dus pa na brjod par bya'o // nyi ma gzhan la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te /

analyzed: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bya'o ;

original: gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gtang bar bya'o //

analyzed: 'ding ngo bting ngo //

original: snyam du sems gsum mo //
